name: The House (itch) (The Parade)
description:
To make it clear in my eyes this game is not complete, but i will continue to polish this game and make it much better. Thank you for playing and taking time out of your day to play. Enjoy! :)

There have been reports coming in about this house out in the middle of nowhere. Flashing lights, people going missing around the area, and calls of distress which were cut off from the public.

One officer was sent to investigate due to a recent call. What could go wrong it's just a House.
